name: Life Finds a Way
description:
Hey everyone! We are Silver Lining Game Group and this is the first game that we've made! In this challenging 2D platformer, you take the role of our robed hero, in search of a special flower to restore life on Earth! 

This game has support for both keyboard and controller, but we would recommend using a controller for the best possible experience.

We used art from  these wonderful artists:
https://aamatniekss.itch.io/
https://o-lobster.itch.io/
https://deep-fold.itch.io/
https://aamatniekss.itch.io/
https://somepx.itch.io/
https://laredgames.itch.io/

  • Play through 35 unique levels
  • Collect all 17 gems
  • Unlock the power of the flower
  • Race yourself or your friends' times with the built in timer

This game is completely free, but donations are always appreciated, and will go towards buying food for 4 broke college students.
